#summary This page contains links and information about all of the current Java Codec downloads for RL-Glue.

*Notes:* To use this or any other codec, you must have RL-Glue Core installed first.

=== Available Downloads ===

 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/c-codec-2.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz C/C++ Codec Distribution 2.0-RC-FINAL-1] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=c-codec-2.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz (File Details)]
  This is a platform-independent project that was built using the GNU Autotools.  It should install on most Linux and Unix platforms, including Mac OS X and on Microsoft Windows under Cygwin.

 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/c-codec-2.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz Mac OS X RL-Glue Core Project and C/C++ Codec Disk Image GLUE-DEV-VERSION] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=c-codec-2.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz (File Details)]
 This is an OS X disk image with familiar installer that will install both RL-Glue Core and the C/C++ Codec onto your Mac.  Intel Mac only.

=== User Quick Install ===
{{{
#Unpack the files
>$ tar -zxf c-codec-2.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz

#Change to unpacked directory
>$ cd /path/to/c-codec-2.0-RC-FINAL-1

#Configure the installation (for advanced options see the manual)
>$ ./configure

#Build the software
>$ make

#Install the software (requires admin privileges)
>$ sudo make install
}}}
